title: Green Shell

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: The upper text explains the mechanic.

desc:
Post 2393
- __Tag: Mario Kart__: This card cannot be played and has its passives disabled unless if this is the most recent-drawn __Mario Kart__ item card.

- You have 🛡️ equal to the **Echo** value of this card + 1 and they are linked.
 - A Blue Shell (223) meant for you discards this card before it activates onto you.
- Playing this card sends a green shell forward, giving a 35% chance to hit the person directly ahead of you in terms of placement, a 20% chance to the 2nd person ahead of you, a 5% chance to hit the 3rd person ahead, and a 1% chance to hit yourself, causing a 1 card draw and a loss of 3 💵 if done successfully.
- The percentage chances are removed if there is nobody occupying the relative placement.
